result.title: why this code does not end when i start it with me(0,5), i is going to increse

using namespace std;

vector sum; unsigned m;

unsigned me (unsigned i , unsigned j) {

if (i>sum.size()-1) { return 0; } else if (i==sum.size()-1) {

if (sum[i]<=j)
        {return sum[i];
        }
        else

}

else if (i<sum.size()-1) {

unsigned a=me(i+1,j) ; unsigned b=me(i+m,j-1); return max( b, a ); }

}
